donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The project will support the National Assembly by helping to strengthen Members' legislative, oversight and representative capacities and assisting the Secretariats to deliver upgraded services to Members.

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The project will support Zanzibar House of Representatives by helping to strengthen Members' legislative, oversight and representative capacities and assisting the Secretariats to deliver upgraded services to Members.

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: Orientation Programme for the new National Assembly  of Tanzania and the Zanzibar House of Representatives in the context of the Government of the National Unity held; Standing Orders of the Zanzibar House of Representatives revised and passed by the House in-line with the requirements of the Government of National Unity; Legislature Support Project (LSP) document drafted and approved; and the LSP operational.

project_descr: Legislatures Support Project (2011-2015). Includes Inception plan and support to National Assembly and Zanzibar House of Representatives.
